A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
First class junk dressed up as a Star Wars film. So many plot holes\, characters needlessly killed\, senseless sub plots\, an obsession with fuel & pointless contradictions\, it appears to have been written as a project by someone who has no understanding of Star Wars lore.

As for the argument that "my kids liked it"\, my kids also like Happy Feet ! 

I could rant for hours about all that is wrong with this\, but in short\, the director/writer appears to have fallen in to the trap of thinking defacing art is also an art form. It isn't.
